Title: US tariff hike threatens EU LNG security and industrial stability: Kpler Insight
Description: Kpler Insight warns that proposed US tariffs on EU goods could severely disrupt Europe's energy security and industrial resilience, particularly putting LNG supply chains at risk.
Author: JS

Title: Bahrain LNG set to receive second cargo, signaling start of commercial operations
Description: Bahrain LNG is expected to receive its second LNG cargo this year in early June, signalling that the commissioning of its long-idle import terminal is likely complete and that commercial operations are set to begin.
Author: CK

Title: North West Shelf LNG set to resume exports as Woodside Rogers loads first cargo in a week
Description: The Woodside-operated 16.3 mtpa North West Shelf LNG plant in Western Australia is set to resume exports after an almost week-long pause in shipments, driven by planned maintenance and potential upstream issues, as the 159,800 m3 Woodside Rogers LNG tanker undergoes loading at the terminal.
Author: CK
